faqs.q: How many calories in a Mike's Hard Lemonade bottle?
faqs.a: Approximately 220 kcal per standard 11.2 fl oz bottle.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in Mike's Hard Lemonade?
faqs.a: About 30 g carbs and 28 g sugars per bottle, mainly from the lemonade mix.

faqs.a: No protein or fat; calories come from alcohol and carbs.
